# Rental Service Website - Full LLM Index

## Purpose
Сайт-каталог домов и бань с формой заявки.

## Source of truth
- Markdown content in `content/`
- Rendering rules in `rules.yaml`
- Telegram lead function in `functions/telegram-lead/`

## Routes
- Home: https://example.com/
- Houses: https://example.com/houses/
- Banyas: https://example.com/banyas/
- Search: https://example.com/search/

## Discovery and indexing
- Sitemap: https://example.com/sitemap.xml
- Search JSON: https://example.com/search.json
- LLM index: https://example.com/llms.txt
